title: Looking for Plat 1 plus Top, Mid and Jungle
body:
Creating team for  OOL and are currently looking for Top, jungle and mid for recruitment. 
Please leave a comment of your 
First  name:
In game name:
Age:
Roles:
Current Rank:
Can you use Discord?:
Any previous competitive Experience in League of Legends:

replies.body:
First name: Ben
IGN: Lovesick
Age: 17
Roles (in order of priority): Mid->ADC->Top
Current rank: D5
Discord: Yes
Previous competitive experience: Scrims, played in OOL 3 times, played in quite a few local(ish) online tourneys

First name: Bobby
In game name: iN yzR
Age: 22.
Roles: Mid.
Current Rank: Plat 3.
Can you use Discord?: yes.
Any previous competitive Experience in League of Legends: Only scrims.

First name: Shay
In game name: Zerkz
Age:22
Roles: ADC/TOP
Current Rank: Solo - P2 ( dropped to this elo from D5 due to decay) Flex - P1
Can you use Discord?: Yes
Any previous competitive Experience in League of Legends: Nope
